pr_title: make aad obo autoconfiguration depend on aad.client-id

timeline.message: make aad obo autoconfiguration depend on aad.client-id

timeline.bodyText:
Can we keep the same style? All use AAD_PREFIX, or not use it at all.
Ofcourse, we can do it after release.
timeline.author: chenrujun

replies.bodyText: I prefer not use it at all. If we want to get some property, we can search by CTRL + SHIFT + F to get them all.
replies.author: chenrujun

timeline.bodyText: Do we need test like testWithRequiredPropertiesSet?
timeline.author: chenrujun

replies.bodyText: Good point. I will add that.
replies.author: saragluna

timeline.message: use SPEL to make condition on authorization-clients

timeline.bodyText:
We'd better add more tests:

client-id configured, but no authorization-clients.
client-id not configured, but authorization-clients configured.
timeline.author: chenrujun

replies.bodyText: Yes, I'm just about to add them.
replies.author: saragluna

replies.bodyText: Current tests can not make sure @ConditionalOnExpression("!'${azure.activedirectory.authorization-clients}'.isEmpty()") take effect.
replies.author: chenrujun

timeline.bodyText:
doesNotHaveBean should use bean name.  AADOAuth2OboAuthorizedClientRepository is not a bean name.
My suggestion is to use
doesNotHaveBean(Class<?> type) {

instead.
timeline.author: chenrujun
chenrujun
